Text: Re FW Your sons first NFL GameHi Paul Happy Thanksgivinghave been hearing about enrons troubles How does this affect your work Were back in AZleft OR just in time I hear it has been rainy and cold after we left Its been really nice here but today is a little cold and some rain Im sure next week will warm up I see you have had some snow in Mts Are you going skiing How is your love life Drop down and see us Take care dad Kathy PS What are Mike and Franks email Sent one to Mike but it came back How is everybody Havent heard from them
